NextOrbit Platform

With our Advanced Predictors and forecasting algorithms, we help you to Predict and Respond to demand peaks and troughs. We enable you to take action before you lose customer demand.

NextOrbit help you to price up or down to maximize profits.

Features

Intelligent Demand Planning

Machine Learning and Human Judgement - we help combine the best of both the worlds.

  • Demand Planning
  • Store Ordering
  • Procurement Recommendations
  • Shelf Space Allocation & Optimisation
  • Intelligent store ordering to enhance sales & Margins.

Intelligent Pricing

Better price realization to improve Sales & Margin.

  • Better product valuation
  • Differential pricing strategies
  • Promotions Recommendations
  • Competitor price monitoring & alerts
  • Markdown recommendations

  • Platform On the Cloud

    Once the data is collected, NextOrbit with its properitory algorithms constantly learning, do the process of

    • Complex Event Processing Time Series
    • Performance Classification
    • Knowledge Mining
    • Pattern Recognition
    • Continous Learning And Adapting

  • Intelligence A Step Ahead

    The Data is processed along with our secret algorithms to provide you better insights on.

    • Demand forcasts
    • Store Orders
    • Price and Promotions
    • Pattern Recognition
    • Recommendations

Pricing

Onboarding Fee
No contracts
Monthly Subscription Fee
Flexible

Transparency & Flexibility

A transparent cost effective monthly subscription model based on the number of stores and categories. No contracts or lockin period for the business.

Fees based on your number of transactions, number of products, and for brick and mortar Retailer - number of stores.
